condition.description:
Your carotid arteries are two large blood vessels in your neck. They supply your brain with blood. If you have carotid artery disease, the arteries become narrow, usually because of atherosclerosis. This is the buildup of cholesterol and other material in an artery. If a blood clot sticks in the narrowed arteries, blood can't reach your brain. This is one of the causes of stroke.

Carotid artery disease often does not cause symptoms, but there are tests that can tell your doctor if you have it. If the arteries are very narrow, you may need an operation called an endarterectomy to remove the plaque. For less severe narrowing, a medicine to prevent blood clots can reduce your risk of stroke. Another option for people who can't have surgery is carotid angioplasty. This involves placing balloons and/or stents into the artery to open it and hold it open.
condition.name: Carotid artery disease

carousel_items: Do not crush or chew capsules. Can take with or without food.
Aggrenox can cause unexpected bleeding or bruising.
Don't take if you're allergic to aspirin.
Headache is a common side effect, but it often goes away after the first week of use.

basics.benefits_moa: Aggrenox is an antiplatelet blood thinner. It is a combination medication with two ingredients, aspirin and dipyridamole. Both make it harder for your body to form blood clots.
basics.bottom_line: Aggrenox prevents blood clots and stroke, but cheaper options are available that work just as well.
downsides: Raises your risk for bleeding and bruising.
Has to be taken twice a day unlike Plavix that only has to be taken once daily.
Can be more expensive than other alternatives that are available as a generic.
Can't be used by people with an aspirin allergy, or a history of stomach ulcers.

downsides_processed.orig: Raises your risk for bleeding and bruising.
Has to be taken twice a day unlike Plavix that only has to be taken once daily.
Can be more expensive than other alternatives that are available as a generic.
Can't be used by people with an aspirin allergy, or a history of stomach ulcers.

upsides: This helps to prevent strokes for people who had a stroke or TIA (transient ischemic attack) before.
In clinical studies, Aggrenox lowered the chance of another stroke for a person with a previous stroke or mini-stroke (TIA) by 36%.
Works better than either aspirin or dipyridamole alone to prevent strokes.
Works as well as Plavix (clopidogrel), another antiplatelet medication, to prevent stroke.

upsides_processed.orig: This helps to prevent strokes for people who had a stroke or TIA (transient ischemic attack) before.
In clinical studies, Aggrenox lowered the chance of another stroke for a person with a previous stroke or mini-stroke (TIA) by 36%.
Works better than either aspirin or dipyridamole alone to prevent strokes.
Works as well as Plavix (clopidogrel), another antiplatelet medication, to prevent stroke.

drugs.one_liner: Prevents blood clots that can cause a stroke.
drugs.name: Aggrenox

carousel_items_processed.orig: Do not crush or chew capsules. Can take with or without food.
Aggrenox can cause unexpected bleeding or bruising.
Don't take if you're allergic to aspirin.
Headache is a common side effect, but it often goes away after the first week of use.

risks_warnings.title: Brain damage or death from Reyes Syndrome
risks_warnings.description: Aggrenox use is linked to a condition called Reye's syndrome that causes liver and brain swelling. This is rare but very serious. Let your doctor know about any nausea, vomiting, unusually low energy, or changes in behavior.
risk_factors: Children 18 years or younger recovering from viral infections

description_processed.orig: Aggrenox use is linked to a condition called Reye's syndrome that causes liver and brain swelling. This is rare but very serious. Let your doctor know about any nausea, vomiting, unusually low energy, or changes in behavior.

risks_warnings.title: Stomach bleeding
risks_warnings.description: Aggrenox can cause serious stomach problems that include swelling, ulcers, bleeding. These problems can be life threatening. The chances that a stomach problem will occur is worse the longer you take this medication, but it can happen at any time. Watch out for blood or dark colored stools when you go to the bathroom. This can be a medical emergency and you should get help right away.
risk_factors: History of stomach bleeding or ulcers
Drinking 3 or more alcoholic drinks a day

description_processed.orig: Aggrenox can cause serious stomach problems that include swelling, ulcers, bleeding. These problems can be life threatening. The chances that a stomach problem will occur is worse the longer you take this medication, but it can happen at any time. Watch out for blood or dark colored stools when you go to the bathroom. This can be a medical emergency and you should get help right away.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Aggrenox contains aspirin. Aspirin can make it difficult to breathe or can cause a severe rash that can be life threatening. This is rare, but stop taking Aggrenox and report any skin rashes, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor and get medical help right away.

description_processed.orig: Aggrenox contains aspirin. Aspirin can make it difficult to breathe or can cause a severe rash that can be life threatening. This is rare, but stop taking Aggrenox and report any skin rashes, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor and get medical help right away.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to unborn babies
risks_warnings.description: Aggrenox contains aspirin. Aspirin can cause birth defects. Don't use Aggrenox while pregnant. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Aggrenox contains aspirin. Aspirin can cause birth defects. Don't use Aggrenox while pregnant. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

risks_warnings.title: Bruising or bleeding
risks_warnings.description: You can bruise more easily while using Aggrenox. If you're bleeding, it can take longer than normal for the bleeding to stop. Tell your doctor about all of your medications and medical conditions before starting Aggrenox. Don't take Aggrenox while using other blood thinning medications unless your doctor tells you it's safe.

description_processed.orig: You can bruise more easily while using Aggrenox. If you're bleeding, it can take longer than normal for the bleeding to stop. Tell your doctor about all of your medications and medical conditions before starting Aggrenox. Don't take Aggrenox while using other blood thinning medications unless your doctor tells you it's safe.

risks_warnings.title: Worsening heart disease
risks_warnings.description: The ingredient dipyridamole in Aggrenox can cause or worsen chest pain for people who have certain heart conditions. Be careful and report any changes in chest pain (angina) to your doctor.

description_processed.orig: The ingredient dipyridamole in Aggrenox can cause or worsen chest pain for people who have certain heart conditions. Be careful and report any changes in chest pain (angina) to your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Taking the wrong aspirin dose for heart protection
risks_warnings.description: Aggrenox contains the ingredient aspirin. However, it does not contain enough aspirin to offer heart protection to prevent chest pains or heart attack. Talk with your doctor about whether you need to take an extra aspirin dose each day for heart protection.
risk_factors: History of coronary artery stent placement

description_processed.orig: Aggrenox contains the ingredient aspirin. However, it does not contain enough aspirin to offer heart protection to prevent chest pains or heart attack. Talk with your doctor about whether you need to take an extra aspirin dose each day for heart protection.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: Aggrenox can cause liver damage or liver failure. Your doctor can do blood tests to check for this problem. Tell your doctor right away if you have any unusual stomach pain, nausea or vomiting.

description_processed.orig: Aggrenox can cause liver damage or liver failure. Your doctor can do blood tests to check for this problem. Tell your doctor right away if you have any unusual stomach pain, nausea or vomiting.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: The ingredient dipyridamole in Aggrenox can cause or worsen low blood pressure. Low blood pressure can feel like you are dizzy or are going to pass out. Be careful and report any dizziness to your doctor.
risk_factors: Prior episodes of low blood pressure

description_processed.orig: The ingredient dipyridamole in Aggrenox can cause or worsen low blood pressure. Low blood pressure can feel like you are dizzy or are going to pass out. Be careful and report any dizziness to your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Kidney damage
risks_warnings.description: Do not use Aggrenox if you have severe kidney disease.

description_processed.orig: Do not use Aggrenox if you have severe kidney disease.

carousel_items: Using low doses (81mg) of aspirin every day can lower your risk of heart attack and stroke, but it isn't good for everyone. Only take aspirin daily if your doctor recommends it.
Higher aspirin doses can be used to treat occasional pain, swelling, and fever. Using ibuprofen or acetaminophen (Tylenol) instead can lower your risk of serious bleeding.
Take with food to lower the chance of an upset stomach.
Don't use for kids younger than 18 years old.
Stop taking this right away and tell your doctor if you have ringing in your ears, unusual bleeding, or nausea or vomiting that doesn't go away.

clock.tip: Take with food or milk to lower stomach upset.

basics.benefits_moa: Aspirin is a salicylate and non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). It blocks the inflammation process in your body, which relieves swelling and pain. It also prevents blood platelets from forming clots, which thins your blood.
basics.bottom_line: A low dose of Aspirin (81mg) every day can protect your heart, but it's not the best medicine to take for pain, swelling, or fever.
downsides: Not a preferred medication for treating pain, swelling, or fever due to its high risk of bleeding.
NSAIDs (like ibuprofen and naproxen) and acetaminophen (Tylenol) are better for treating pain and fever thank aspirin.
Aspirin raises your risk of bleeding, especially when used with other blood thinner medications like warfarin (Coumadin).
Studies show that using higher doses of Aspirin (162 mg or more) every day raises your risk of stomach bleeding and doesn't provide any additional heart protection.

downsides_processed.orig: Not a preferred medication for treating pain, swelling, or fever due to its high risk of bleeding.
NSAIDs (like ibuprofen and naproxen) and acetaminophen (Tylenol) are better for treating pain and fever thank aspirin.
Aspirin raises your risk of bleeding, especially when used with other blood thinner medications like warfarin (Coumadin).
Studies show that using higher doses of Aspirin (162 mg or more) every day raises your risk of stomach bleeding and doesn't provide any additional heart protection.

upsides: When taking low doses (81 mg) every day, aspirin provides protection for your heart and prevents heart attacks and stroke.
Used in higher doses to relieve pain, swelling, and fever.
Available over-the-counter in drugstores by itself and in combination with other cold and flu medications.

upsides_processed.orig: When taking low doses (81 mg) every day, aspirin provides protection for your heart and prevents heart attacks and stroke.
Used in higher doses to relieve pain, swelling, and fever.
Available over-the-counter in drugstores by itself and in combination with other cold and flu medications.

drugs.one_liner: Relieves pain, fever, and inflammation. Protects your heart and thins blood.

userStories.tip: research and understand the actual reason to take this medicine, as well as any medicine - than it will be helpful. Don't take it "just because". High quality Aspirin (e.g. Bayer) is much better (better effect without harming)

drugs.name: Aspirin

Stop taking this right away and tell your doctor if you have ringing in your ears, unusual bleeding, or nausea or vomiting that doesn't go away.

risks_warnings.title: Brain damage or death from Reye's Syndrome
risks_warnings.description: Aspirin use is linked to a condition called Reye's syndrome that causes liver and brain swelling. This is rare but very serious. Let your doctor know about any nausea, vomiting, unusually low energy, or changes in behavior.

description_processed.orig: Aspirin use is linked to a condition called Reye's syndrome that causes liver and brain swelling. This is rare but very serious. Let your doctor know about any nausea, vomiting, unusually low energy, or changes in behavior.

risks_warnings.title: Stomach bleeding
risks_warnings.description: Aspirin can cause serious problems including inflammation, bleeding, and ulcers in the stomach or intestines. The longer you take Aspirin, the higher the risk is. If you notice blood or a dark/black color in your stool, tell your doctor right away.
risk_factors: History of stomach bleeding or ulcers
Taking aspirin, NSAIDs, or blood thinners
Drinking more than 3 alcoholic beverages a day

description_processed.orig: Aspirin can cause serious problems including inflammation, bleeding, and ulcers in the stomach or intestines. The longer you take Aspirin, the higher the risk is. If you notice blood or a dark/black color in your stool, tell your doctor right away.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Aspirin can cause serious allergic reactions. These reactions can make it difficult to breathe or can cause a severe rash that can be life threatening. Get medical help immediately if you develop a skin rash, fever, swelling, or have trouble breathing.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Aspirin can cause serious allergic reactions. These reactions can make it difficult to breathe or can cause a severe rash that can be life threatening. Get medical help immediately if you develop a skin rash, fever, swelling, or have trouble breathing.
